text: Responsive site: fixed 60px header, fluid main, fixed 40px footer.
Optimize product load: WebP images 75%, minify, lazy load below fold.
Reduce modal: 400px width, 500px height, show user profile.
Remove top banner if 'bannerDismissed' in local storage is 'true'.
JWT auth: cookie, login '/api/auth/login' with username/password.
Restyle primary '.btn-primary': blue #007bff, white #fff, rounded 5px.
Carousel: autoplay product images from '/api/products/[id]/images' API.
Accessible search: label 'Search', live ARIA for suggestions.
Datepicker: 'MM/DD/YYYY', single date, keyboard navigation enabled.
Validate registration: required, email regex, password matches confirm.
Paginate products: ten per page, 'Previous'/'Next' buttons shown.
Upload avatar: JPEG/PNG max 2MB, show preview before upload.
Category filter: multi-select dropdown from '/api/categories' API.
Star rating: show average from '/api/products/[id]/rating' API.
Modal: 'Delete?' prompt, 'Cancel'/'Confirm' buttons, focus trapped.
Related products: five from API, show name/image/price.
Toast: green #4CAF50 success, red #f44336 error, top-right.
Autosuggest: '/api/search/suggestions', display product name/category.
Homepage carousel: three rotating banners, 3s CSS transitions.
Contact form: required 'name'/'email', basic '@' email check.
Show 'loading...' div during async fetch from '/api/data'.
Scroll to top button after 500px scroll from top.
Cookie banner: 'Accept'/'Decline', 'cookieConsent' in local storage.
Keyboard nav: tab focuses, enter activates '#main-nav' links.
Countdown to '2025-12-25T00:00:00Z', update '#promotion-timer' each second.
Drag/drop reorder '#sortable-list', update DOM list order.
Image preview in '#image-preview' on file input change.
Copy '#code-snippet' text to clipboard on '#copy-button' click.
Progress bar in '#loading-bar' during initial page load.
Infinite scroll '#article-list' from '/api/articles' on scroll end.
'Back to top' link smooth scrolls to document top.
Tabbed nav: click '.tabs' shows '.tab-content', adds 'active'.
Accordion: click '.accordion-header' toggles '.accordion-content'.
Contact submit: POST JSON to '/api/contact', show response.
TOC: links to <h2>/<h3> in '#main-content', highlight active.
Rating stars in '#product-rating' based on API value.
Tag input '#tag-input': comma/enter adds to '#tag-list'.
Color swatch in '#color-selector': click sets 'selectedColor'.
File tree '#file-tree': nested lists, expand/collapse directories.
Transfer list '#transfer-list': move items between '#source-list'/#destination-list'.
Timeline in '#timeline': events from '/api/timeline' with date/text.
Avatar upload '#avatar-upload': preview in '#avatar-preview', POST API.
Rating scale in '#rating-scale': radio 'Poor' to 'Excellent' select.
Tag cloud in '#tag-cloud': size by weight from '/api/tags'.
Data grid in '#data-grid': sort/filter/resize columns.
WYSIWYG editor for '#editor': basic formatting toolbar.
Gradient picker in '#gradient-picker': two color inputs, preview.
Icon picker in '#icon-picker': grid of Font Awesome icons.
Kanban board: drag/drop tasks between columns.
QR code for '#qr-input' to '#qr-image', download option.
